title: An Odd Problem with the Langauge Filter
body: So in my settings in the main menu I have my language filter off and when I'm chatting with my friends in the home page the filter remains off and nothing is censored. However, I've noticed that in champ select and in game that the langauge filter is some how turned back on and censors words. I've looked through the settings in game and there is not a different place to enable it. So I was wondering why the filter settings are being different when I'm in the main menu and when I'm in game. So I was curious to if anybody else is having this happen to them as well.

replies.body:
It sounds like your client may be having issues disabling the feature. This is a fairly rare issue we see pop up in the Beta Client. You should be able to resolve this with the steps listed below:

>**1.** Launch League and Log in then minimize the client
**2.** Navigate to the Config Folder *(C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config)* and open the **LCUAccountPreferences.yaml** file with Notepad any other text editor
**3.** Find the line that says "**chatFilterDisabled: false**" and change it to **"chatFilterDisabled: true"**
**4.** Save the changes you made to this file in your text editor, then close League and relog.
**5.** Your chat filter should show as disabled after checking your settings (cog in top-right of the Client) under your *Chat & Friends* section.

After taking those steps, hop into a custom match to confirm the changes went through and that everything is working as intended. Let me know if this worked for you, please! :)

So I did what you said and when I opened it in Notepad it already said the "chatFilterDisabled: true" so I deleted the true and retyped it to see if it would work and it did not. So should i try typing in "false" save it and then type in "true" to see if that would work?

You can give it a go, but if it doesn't end up working like it didn't for *DaC* down below, I'd recommend posting about this on our [**Bug Tracker.**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) This is a known issue with the Beta Client at the moment that we're looking into.

Let me know if you have any questions.

I have the same exact problem. I tried the solution offered and also saving false then true, but my words still get censored in game. I don't think they're censored in champ select though. The language filter remains unchecked in my client settings.
